replies.body: UMM what is so special about these champions?
its the champs they used in last seasons opl final.

Any ideas about where 2016 OPL Finals Will Be held?

Cause 2015 was awesome

I'd wager Oceania.

2015 Finals at Luna Park was magical.
at this point in time, OPL 2016 is apparently scheduled to be held in the courier-mail piazza of Brisbane 13th august. there was a page but i cant seem to find it so uno
In the Legacy bundle it lists Tahm Kench as Tahmn Kench, just thought I'd let someone know
The n is silent as in "_Damn_, we misspelled Tahm Kench".

I hate it how riot makes the champs so expensive (rp wise)
And i get that this is a free game so riot needs to make money in some sort of way, but it takes ages to get ip and it took me 2 years to just get 58 champs with only 2 rune pages.. It's rediculous. I have bought fizz (when he was on sale last time) and still it's expensive.
i think it`s the champions they{{champion:223}}  use go {{champion:15}} {{champion:112}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:64}}
